com.github.dakusui.pcond.validator

  • Packages that use com.github.dakusui.pcond.validator 
    Package Description
    com.github.dakusui.pcond.internals
    A package to place utility classes internally used by the pcond library.

  • Classes in com.github.dakusui.pcond.validator used by com.github.dakusui.pcond.internals 
    Class and Description
    Explanation 
  • Classes in com.github.dakusui.pcond.validator used by com.github.dakusui.pcond.validator 
    Class and Description
    ExceptionComposer
    An interface to define how an exception is composed based on a given message, a class of a condition that the value violates (non-null constraint, invalid state, input validation), and the context the violation happened (pre-, post-condition check, test-assertion, etc.).
    ExceptionComposer.Base
    An interface that defines common methods that an object returned by each method in the ExceptionComposer has.
    ExceptionComposer.ForAssertion 
    ExceptionComposer.ForEnsure 
    ExceptionComposer.ForRequire 
    ExceptionComposer.ForTestAssertion 
    ExceptionComposer.ForValidate 
    ExceptionComposer.Utils 
    ExceptionComposer.Utils.ReflectiveExceptionFactory 
    Explanation 
    MessageComposer
    An interface that defines methods to compose a message when a value violates a given condition based on a context.
    ReportComposer 
    ReportComposer.FormattedEntry 
    ReportComposer.Report 
    ReportComposer.Utils 
    Validator
    An interface of a policy for behaviours on 'contract violations'.
    Validator.Configuration 
    Validator.Configuration.Builder 
    Validator.Configuration.Debugging
    When com.github.dakusui.pcond.debug is not true, it is assumed that those methods in this interface return false.
    Validator.Configuration.Utils 
    Validator.ExceptionFactory
